Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.quota

Class RoleBasedQuotaManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bluezoo.gumdrop.quota.RoleBasedQuotaManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    QuotaManager
    public class RoleBasedQuotaManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements QuotaManager
    A quota manager that supports both user-specific and role-based quotas.

    This implementation uses a Realm for role membership checks and persists usage data to the filesystem.

    Quota Resolution

    1. User quota - Specific override for a user (highest priority)
    2. Role quota - Based on user's role memberships (most generous wins)
    3. Default quota - System-wide fallback
    4. Unlimited - If none of the above are defined

    Configuration Example

    
 <component id="quotaManager" class="org.bluezoo.gumdrop.quota.RoleBasedQuotaManager">
   <property name="realm" ref="#mainRealm"/>
   <property name="storage-dir">/var/gumdrop/quota</property>
   <property name="default-quota">1GB</property>
   
   <!-- Role-based quotas -->
   <property name="role-quota.admin">unlimited</property>
   <property name="role-quota.premium">10GB</property>
   <property name="role-quota.standard">1GB</property>
   <property name="role-quota.guest">100MB</property>
 </component>
    Author:
    Chris Burdess
    See Also:
    QuotaManager, Quota

      • getQuota

        public Quota getQuota​(java.lang.String username)
        Description copied from interface: QuotaManager
        Gets the effective quota for a user.

        This returns the quota that applies to the user based on the priority order: user-specific, role-based, default, or unlimited.

        Specified by:
        getQuota in interface QuotaManager
        Parameters:
        username - the username
        Returns:
        the user's effective quota (never null)

      • recalculateUsage

        public void recalculateUsage​(java.lang.String username)
        Description copied from interface: QuotaManager
        Recalculates and updates the current usage for a user.

        This method forces a full recalculation of the user's storage usage, typically by scanning their mailbox or file system.

        Specified by:
        recalculateUsage in interface QuotaManager
        Parameters:
        username - the username
